\** TRASH WILL BE PICKED UP ON FRIDAY, JULY 4TH \**

RAM Waste Systems will be running their regular scheduled routes on Friday, July 4th.  

Please have containers out before 7am on Friday, 7/4/25 for service.

## Regular Meetings

Meetings are held at 7 p.m. on the first and third Tuesday of each month at the Town Hall, which is located at 400 Grand Avenue, Platteville, CO 80651.

Additional meetings are scheduled as needed. Meetings of the Board are open to the public and members of the community are encouraged to attend.

## Members

The Board of Trustees for the Town of Platteville is made up of the Mayor and a six member Board. The Mayor serves two-year terms; Members of the Board of Trustees serve four-year terms.

The Mayor and Members of the Board of Trustees are elected at large, meaning they serve the entire community, not a specific neighborhood or geographic area. 

### Responsibilities

The Board of Trustees is the governing body of the Town. They adopt laws through Ordinances and develop policies that form the foundation for the community.

In addition, the Board provides financial guidance in the creation of the Town's annual budget, and when prioritizing capital projects - the construction or maintenance of the Town's infrastructure; the streets, water and sewer lines, buildings and other facilities owned and operated by the Town.

## Town of Platteville

## We're Social

 

* * *

The Town of Platteville is committed to providing equitable access to our services to all residents and customers. Our ongoing accessibility effort works towards being in line with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) version 2.2, level AA criteria. We welcome comments on how to improve this [website’s accessibility](https://platteville.colorado.gov/website-accessibility "Website Accessibility") for users with disabilities and for requests for accommodations. Please submit questions via [this form](https://platteville.colorado.gov/website-feedback) or request an [accommodation](https://platteville.colorado.gov/request-for-accommodation).
